Actions.Name: Delete Row
Actions.Description: This operation is used to retrieve a row from a Google Sheet.

Actions.Name: Get row
Actions.Description: This operation retrieves a single row from a Google Sheet.

Actions.Name: Get rows
Actions.Description: This operation retrieves the records from a specific Google Sheet.

Actions.Name: Get sheets
Actions.Description: Retrieves sheet names from a Google Sheet file

Actions.Name: Update row
Actions.Description: This operation updates a row in a Google Sheet.

Actions.Name: Insert row
Actions.Description: This operation is used to insert a new row in a Google Sheet.
